mdRecord.dcterms:title: Drewsteignton street with view of church tower
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Drewsteignton is a picturesque village in the Teign [River] valley, 13 miles west of Exeter and 9 miles south east of Okehampton, lying on the edge of Dartmoor National Park. ... [work]
The local beauty spot of Fingle Bridge is situated beside the river Teign within walking distance of the Village. ... [work]

Castle Drogo is situated on the edge of the Village. It was the last castle to be built in England, set above the Teign Gorge with dramatic views over Dartmoor. -- http://www.drewsteigntonparish.co.uk/drewsteignton.html [work]
